title: Folk art
brief_description: Shows a variety of home crafts. A wood carver creating complex scenes and individual figures; women painting the walls of their homes with brightly colored floral designs; a potter making and decorating attractive pieces of pottery; expert needle women designing and working intricate pieces of embroidery.
